channel.title: Stupid things in cars
channel.description:
What i mean is, have you done stupid things, or been in a car with a person that has done stupid things and got/almost got caught for something illegal? If you got away, mention how :P Or even put a small story.
Me: [ul][li]Went 100 in a 55 past a state trooper - managed to take a side-street and get away before he was able to get a good look at me car.[/li] [li]Street raced and passed state trooper - The cop went into the ditch when turning around, so I kept going. They came a few days later asking about it. I knew nothing :P[/li] [li]Stuck my ass out the window on the highway - Went to my friends house and put my car in his garage[/li][/ul]
I'm actually a very safe driver when I want to be, I just gotta do stupid shit ever now and then. Discuss :)
EDIT: Lol, for example, something stupid like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GTqlzobiBE4&feature=related

item.title: Stupid things in cars
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:54, topic:354461”]I drove into a mall and killed 317 people, then my brakes broke and i killed 474 people. Just when i thought it was over i flipped out of the mall killing 508 people. Then rolled into the street killing 517 people. Suddenly a truck hit me and i flew down the sidewalk killing 525 people. Then i flipped again, rolling into a store killing 562 people. I got out and walked across the street, but i dropped my wallet, a truck bounced over it and rolled onto the sidewalk killing 602 people. I thought it was finally over when suddenly the back of the truck opened and watermelons started spilling out the back killing 614 people.

(Not for real just thought some people would lol if this is spam ill remove)[/quote]

coolstorybro

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid things in cars
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

I drove into a mall and killed 317 people, then my brakes broke and i killed 474 people. Just when i thought it was over i flipped out of the mall killing 508 people. Then rolled into the street killing 517 people. Suddenly a truck hit me and i flew down the sidewalk killing 525 people. Then i flipped again, rolling into a store killing 562 people. I got out and walked across the street, but i dropped my wallet, a truck bounced over it and rolled onto the sidewalk killing 602 people. I thought it was finally over when suddenly the back of the truck opened and watermelons started spilling out the back killing 614 people.

(Not for real just thought some people would lol if this is spam ill remove)

item.title: Stupid things in cars
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:49, topic:354461”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451032.msg3317205#msg3317205 date=1282407077]

Wuts so bad about women in cars?

They’re out of the kitchen.

I have a $20,000 car. I drive safe. Had my license for 3 years, never been pulled over, ticketed, nor in an accident. I don’t drive slow or anything, I usually drive 5-10 over.

Seriously dude, just go, if you don’t have respect for women, your better off going to a Amish town to live, since all they do is cook/clean, and all the men do is build shit.

Obviously you can’t comprehend sarcasm when it’s right in front of your face. I guarantee that I respect woman more than most people here. The internet isn’t a seriously place, stop acting as if it is. Also, learn the Amish lifestyle before you try to talk about it.

Obviously you don’t know MPSC, this is very believable coming from these noobs.
[/quote]
Implying that I don’t know a forum that I’ve been on more than twice the amount/period of time that you have is outrageous. I’ve been registered to these forums six days shy of 4 years.[/quote]
I’m talking about the people within MPSC, not MPSC itself. Also, the amount of time you have been registered is nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid things in cars
item.dc:creator: @Droppin_Nukkas Droppin Nukkas
item.description:
@Droppin_Nukkas wrote:

Went through a bigger town near mine with a shitload of apples, threw them at cars that were parked on the side of the street. Then my friend decided to throw one at a taxi driving passed us

Driving through downtown Wisconsin Dells (you should know where that is o.o) and had a taco bell cup full of soda and threw it at someone sitting on a bench.

Yelling shit at people who are walking on the sidewalk.

Stole someones cat

There are many many more, but I cbf to post them all.

Read full topic
